casebody.data:
STATE v. CARTER No. COA06-857. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed June 5, 2007. Certification Date June 25, 2007. Appeal from Wake (04CRS109571, 04CRS109573, 04CRS1115142, 04CRS1115143, 04CRS1115144).

Cases reported without published opinion. No prejudicial error in part, remanded in part.
